TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ConfigurationConverterBase extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter
Public MustInherit Class ConfigurationConverterBase Inherits TypeConverter
public ref class ConfigurationConverterBase abstract : System::ComponentModel::TypeConverter

summary.span: 配置转换器类型的基类。

span.span: The base class for the configuration converter types.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 是转换器配置类型的基类。The is the base class for the converter configuration types. 这些类型将在配置文件中找到的字符串转换为相关的强类型属性。These are types that convert strings, found in the configuration file, to and from the related strongly typed properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 类派生，以创建自定义 转换器类型。The following code examples show how to derive from the class to create a custom converter type. 此外，这些示例演示如何在自定义节中使用此类型。Also, the examples show how to use this type in a custom section. 下面的代码示例演示如何从类创建自定义 转换器类型 。The following code example shows how to create a custom converter type from the class. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter/CS/TimeSpanMinutesConverter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter/VB/TimeSpanMinutesConverter.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何定义使用上一个自定义转换器的自定义节 。The following code example shows how to define a custom section that uses the previous custom converter. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationConvertersCustomSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationConvertersCustomSection/CS/ConfigurationConvertersCustomSection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationConvertersCustomSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationConvertersCustomSection/VB/ConfigurationConvertersCustomSection.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用上一个自定义节来创建和修改配置文件。The following code example shows how to create and modify a configuration file using the previous custom section. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase/CS/ConfigurationConverterBase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationConverterBase/VB/ConfigurationConverterBase.vb#1)] 下面是前面的示例使用的配置摘录。The following is a configuration excerpt as used by the previous example. ```xml
```

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于通常使用系统提供的转换器类型，因此，只有 当您必须创建自己的转换类型时，才需要构造函数。Because you normally use the converter types provided by the system, the only time you need the constructor is when you must create your own conversion type.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool CanConvertFrom (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext ctx, Type type);

Determines whether the conversion is allowed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法确定是否可以对强类型属性执行转换，以获取在配置文件中使用的值字符串。The method determines whether a conversion can be performed on strongly typed properties to obtain value strings used in the configuration file. ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何重写 方法以创建自定义 转换器类型。The following example code shows how to override the method to create a custom converter type. 此外，该示例还演示如何在自定义节中使用此类型。Also, the example shows how to use this type in a custom section. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter/CS/TimeSpanMinutesConverter.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter/VB/TimeSpanMinutesConverter.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法确定配置文件中包含的字符串是否可以转换为相关的强类型属性。The method determines whether the strings contained in the configuration file can be converted to the related strongly typed properties. ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何重写 方法以创建自定义 转换器类型。The following example code shows how to override the method to create a custom converter type. 此外，该示例还演示如何在自定义节中使用此类型。Also, the example shows how to use this type in a custom section. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter/CS/TimeSpanMinutesConverter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesConverter/VB/TimeSpanMinutesConverter.vb#2)]
